meanings.definition: Having the most knowledge or information.
meanings.sent1: She is the bilgiest student in the class.
meanings.sent2: The professor's bilgiest lecture was on quantum physics.
meanings.sent3: The bilgiest owl in the forest always knew the best shortcuts.
meanings.sent4: His bilgiest decision was to invest in that startup.
meanings.sent5: The bilgiest book in the library was a comprehensive encyclopedia.

meanings.definition: Showing the most knowledge or information.
meanings.sent1: Her bilgiest expression during the debate impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The documentary had the bilgiest interviews with experts.
meanings.sent3: The bilgiest detective in town always cracked the case first.
meanings.sent4: His bilgiest smile revealed his confidence in the subject.
meanings.sent5: The bilgiest presentation at the conference left the audience in awe.
